name: Wipe Out the Virus!
description:
Welcome to the world of Wipe Out the Virus! Eliminate the incoming viruses by shooting sanitizer bullets and save yourself from getting infected! 

Click on the start screen to proceed. Point the crosshair with your mouse and use Left Click or Space button to shoot. Kill 20 viruses to proceed to the next level, kill 30 more to go to the city, and 30 more to win the game. If you get infected, press Y to go back to the jungle or press N to go to the start screen. Press E on the start screen to play the endless mode. Have fun!

Tirth Patel (Programmer), Yaqing Gu (Artist)
